title: Embroidery Sample, late 18th–early 19th century
medium:
Medium: silk thread, silver wire, glass and paper
Technique: embroidered on a compound foundation
creditline: Museum purchase from Au Panier Fleuri Fund
description: Floral pattern embroidered with white silk, clear and purple glass and silver wire on a vertically striped blue and black ground.
